author: mklement0
body:
Now that [semantic version numbers](http://semver.org/) (semver) are becoming ubiquitous, it would be nice to be able to do something like

```powershell
$ [semver] '1.2.3-preview-02+build42'

Major Minor Patch Label         
----- ----- ----- -----         
    1     2     3 preview-02+build42

```

instead of what you currently need to do:

```powershell
$ [System.Management.Automation.SemanticVersion] '1.2.3-preview-02+build42'
```

comments.author: oising
